title: Banned due to Overwolf products
body:
Hey riot, before we start off and get the web based one banned too, i want to say i am so sorry that i used overwolf products that may have altered the game in any way, i had no idea what so ever that they could do that, if i had known that i would not have used them, i thought they were ok due to a paid advert on youtube and some people like redmercy and Virkayu who recommended some produces from overwolf that gave me a false idea of what these apps do, because i wasnt trying to cheat malicously and after i noted that my games began to run slow because of the apps i uninstalled the apps about some months ago recently, but some of the apps feautres remained on my client, i swear i had no ill intent and i will do what ever it takes to clear those suspisions out, i have sent a ticket yesterday when i first found the ban, i want to talk peacfully about this and hopfully resolve this issue, i love this game to its very core (yes even teemo) and i dont want to be removed for misunderstanding what overwolfs products did, ive been with you guys since season 2 or 3 and i would love to keep with you guys for many more seasons. again i am deeply sorry for seemingly taking that trust from you guys without meaning to, i hope to hear soon to see if we can resolve this matter

ADDENDEM
i was hacked it seems, so while overwolf is not the cause, i am still not at fault due to someone who was using my account to boost a friend up

replies.body: Yeah it's definitely not cause of Overwolf. I've used it for a long time and not had any issues.   It was likely something else.
it was, i was hacked because overwolf app had a malware on it that hacked my password

> [{quoted}](name=Evolution Mutt,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=gVmbIwkg,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2019-10-25T23:21:45.998+0000)
>
> it was, i was hacked because overwolf app had a malware on it that hacked my password

Overwolf being the cause is pure conjecture. There are tons of ways that your account info could have been compromised to the internet. It's just better to be safe than sorry and remove stuff that you're not sure of.
thank you x.x sorry this entire situation is fucked and its stressin me out

> [{quoted}](name=Evolution Mutt,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=gVmbIwkg,comment-id=0004000000000000,timestamp=2019-10-25T23:35:43.029+0000)
>
> thank you x.x sorry this entire situation is fucked and its stressin me out

It's no problem, getting your account hacked is stressful (I remember when I lost my WoW account briefly that way).

While you wait on your ticket I would recommend you download various virus/malware checking tools if you don't already have them. Spybot S&D and Malwarebytes are my recommendations. They both have free versions that are decent enough.

If you use the same password for anything else, change them once you made sure your computer is clean.

Given that it's nearly the weekend you might be waiting longer than normal on your ticket. So don't sit there on the edge of your seat for hours on end stressing yourself out. Check back in the morning and play some other games in the meantime.
Submit a support ticket, they may consider a unbanning. But I know they are stickler for third party programs... even ones that just change voice lines (which is stupid asf). So good luck!
i did yesterday, this was my first time dealing with these programs, which blantly lied about being good to use with leauge
Update? The same thing just happened to me

> [{quoted}](name=SKT T1 BB,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=gVmbIwkg,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2019-11-25T03:22:11.086+0000)
>
> Update? The same thing just happened to me

If you look at OP's match history they've been playing games since the post. It's safe to assume everything got resolved.

Might want to check your match history.

Obviously I can't claim for sure, but your last two games look like it was by a different person. You almost never touch ranked mode but suddenly your account played 2 matches on champions that you've never played and queued with a person that you've never played with.

If these were not you then you need to tell support that your account was compromised.
wait...I NEVER PLAYED RANKED RECENTLY

> [{quoted}](name=Evolution Mutt,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=gVmbIwkg,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2019-10-25T22:52:30.224+0000)
>
> wait...I NEVER PLAYED RANKED RECENTLY

Sounds like someone (other than you) was on your account. IMO, you starting to use overwolf and your account getting broken into seems too big of a coincidence. Might want to change your passwords for any other account you have on your computer. And remove overwolf (obviously).
i have to get my account unbanned first, i dont get why i was a target

> [{quoted}](name=Evolution Mutt,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=gVmbIwkg,comment-id=0001000000000000,timestamp=2019-10-25T22:55:34.402+0000)
>
> i have to get my account unbanned first, i dont get why i was a target

Given that in your ranked matches there's a shared teammate between the two, I suspect that your account was being used to boost someone. So it's not so much that you were a target, any account at your rank would have done just as well.
god damn it, and i cant get a live chat for some reason so i cant get this resolved now
This is not an issue they deal with over live chat anyway to my knowledge.
god damn it x.x..i was so close to finishing the event too, i swear there has to be a fast way to get ahold of riot so that this can be fixed
Why is your issue more important than everyone else contacting support for various reasons.
it isnt, im just really frustrated that this happened and we all know what frustration does

I understand completely. I’ve had to go through account recovery before. Once your ticket has its turn, it *should* be a quick and easy process. Just answer to the best of your ability and don’t worry if you get it wrong or can’t answer some.
Yeah that sucks man. Good luck with support. (I havent looked through the whole thread so idk if its resolved now but GL anyway)
it was a mistake on my end, i was hacked to be used for a cheating booster

What.

Overwolf is not cheating software, it is a well-known (but shitty) communication tool. There is no reason it would have been flagged or resulted in a ban.

Nobody ever got banned for using Overwolf,same goes for you.Either you were toxic or you used 3rd party app.People have been using Overwolf for a long time and have been rewarded for using it,with Riot's approval.
So stop with your bs and enjoy the vacation.
ive never used a third party app that causes changes to the game, only the stuff overwolf did, my account got hacked after i saw my accounts past match history, i havnt played ranked in a while

Well,look at it from a bright side.Its not your first account that got banned,so it shouldnt be a problem for you to create 1 more,after all those.So keep that mentality,keep denying and you will get to the silver promos one day.

i did nothing wrong on this other then dealing with overwolf, i never asked to have some asshole suddenly come on and throw this holier then thou shit on me, i never play qiyana unless i got stuck with her in aram, instead my account gets hacked while i was in college, and to be honest, yes, this IS my first account to be banned, i dont exactly have accounts other then one i had planned for next season which i had to create on the fly, but now i find out that i did nothing wrong except getting hacked isnt something i cna live with
Then why is it when I did an investigation, I got results for malware almost immediately?

> [{quoted}](name=FNC Snow,realm=EUNE,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=gVmbIwkg,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2019-10-25T23:08:26.859+0000)
>
> Nobody ever got banned for using Overwolf,same goes for you.Either you were toxic or you used 3rd party app.People have been using Overwolf for a long time and have been rewarded for using it,with Riot's approval.
> So stop with your bs and enjoy the vacation.

There's no harm in giving the OP the proper recommendations as if they are telling the truth. It's not like the board users have any power to come to as informed of a decision as Riot nor can the board users influence the action Riot takes.

If OP is telling the truth, Riot can check to see if the account was played in a different location during those games. If OP is lying, Riot will see that's not the case.

Yeah, never use third party apps like that, especially when it gets sponsored by a crushed beer can. And if something is still on the computer after you uninstalled it, then that means you have some malware on your computer and it's time for a purge and resetting all of your passwords.

And don't ever use third party apps without doing some real hard research into it and scanning it to within an inch of its life. If you get even so much as one malware notification about it, blacklist it.
lesson learned too lat since i got hacked
